import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import { useRef } from "react"; export default function ContactMe() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_cyaaj2u", // ✅ Your EmailJS service ID "template_c8vci5h", // ✅ Your EmailJS template ID form.current, "5Ny9mPi54Y50WBKBY" // ✅ Your EmailJS public key ) .then( () => { alert("Message sent successfully!"); form.current.reset(); }, () => { alert("Failed to send message. Please try again."); } ); }; return (
